comments:
It happens when I accidentally selected Mylar's task working set when checking out project from CVS.
I guess Team/CVS plugins shouldn't offer non-resource forking sets on checkout wizard in the first place, but this NPE should be safeguarded.

It is a cross project issue, relevant for Europa release.
Approving a simple null check addition for RC4.
Markus and Benno, can you review the patch?

The patch from comment 5 is not the right solution. As Eugene correctly states in comment 3, this is a bug in CheckoutProjectOperation and it needs to be fixed there.
The finalElementList argument to "oldSet.setElements(finalElementList);" must not contain null elements.

I run into similar NPEs when trying to check out into a Breakpoint working set:

patch2

Shame on me, my patch for bug 167595 actually broke this :-(.

This patch fixes the problem at the source.
I verified that the other callers of IWorkingSet.adaptElements(..) are OK.

+1 for patch2.

Michael, could you please check & release patch2?
This can be a major problem, since the user cannot remove the null elements again.
Yes, great to see this fixed for 3.3.
